results.title: Metformin Directly Binds to MMP-9 to Improve Plaque Stability

results.title: Overexpression of long noncoding RNA ANRIL inhibits phenotypic switching of vascular smooth muscle cells to prevent atherosclerotic plaque development in vivo
results.text_hl: We further investigated if lncRNA-@GENE_CDKN2B_AS1 @GENE_100048912 @@@ANRIL@@@ is involved in the growth of @<m>DISEASE_Plaque_Atherosclerotic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058226 @@@atherosclerotic plaque@@@ suppressed by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in vivo.

results.title: Mitochondria-targeted esculetin and metformin delay endothelial senescence by promoting fatty acid beta-oxidation: Relevance in age-associated atherosclerosis.
results.text_hl: Similar results were observed in @GENE_APOE @GENE_348 @@@Apoe@@@-/- @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ aorta and @DISEASE_Liver_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@liver@@@ tissue with a parallel reduction in age-associated @<m>DISEASE_Plaque_Atherosclerotic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058226 @@@atherosclerotic plaque formation@@@ and degeneration of @DISEASE_Liver_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@liver@@@ with either Mito-Esc or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ administration.

results.title: Telomere stabilization by metformin mitigates the progression of atherosclerosis via the AMPK-dependent p-PGC-1alpha pathway.

results.title: Plaque microstructures during metformin therapy in type 2 diabetic subjects with coronary artery disease: optical coherence tomography analysis.
results.text_hl: ...Background: While @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ is recommended as a first-line cardioprotective therapy for @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, whether it exerts direct effects on @<m>DISEASE_Plaque_Atherosclerotic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058226 @@@atherosclerotic plaque@@@ remains uncertain.

citations.NLM: Kataoka Y, Nicholls SJ, Andrews J, Uno K, Kapadia SR, Tuzcu EM, Nissen SE, Puri R. results.title: Chronic lathyrism and atheromatosis in the rat. Protective effect of metformin.
results.text_hl: Addition of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ to @CHEMICAL_beta_aminopropionitrile_fumarate @CHEMICAL_MESH:C027243 @@@BAPN@@@ prevented the formation of @<m>DISEASE_Plaque_Atherosclerotic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058226 @@@atheromatous lesions@@@ in the aorta and minimized the level of @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipids@@@ in the aortic wall and of the dermis.

results.title: AMPKalpha inactivation destabilizes atherosclerotic plaque in streptozotocin-induced diabetic mice through AP-2alpha/miRNA-124 axis.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ functions as a stabilizer of @<m>DISEASE_Plaque_Atherosclerotic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058226 @@@atherosclerotic plaque@@@ to reduce @DISEASE_Acute_Coronary_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D054058 @@@acute coronary@@@ accent.

results.title: Metformin inhibits monocyte-to-macrophage differentiation via AMPK-mediated inhibition of STAT3 activation: potential role in atherosclerosis.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ attenuated @GENE_AGT @GENE_11606 @@@Ang-II@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Plaque_Atherosclerotic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058226 @@@atheromatous plaque formation@@@ and @DISEASE_Aortic_Aneurysm @DISEASE_MESH:D001014 @@@aortic aneurysm@@@ in ApoE(-/-) @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ partly by reducing monocyte infiltration.

results.title: Metformin regulates mitochondrial biogenesis and senescence through AMPK mediated H3K79 methylation: Relevance in age-associated vascular dysfunction.
results.journal: Biochim Biophys Acta Mol Basis Dis
results.text_hl: Furthermore, a chronic low dose administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ significantly attenuated vascular aging and inhibited age-associated @<m>DISEASE_Plaque_Atherosclerotic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058226 @@@atherosclerotic plaque formation@@@ in ApoE-/- @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

results.title: Metaformin: an antiatherosclerotic agent modifying very low density lipoproteins in rabbits.
results.text_hl: The composition of very low density lipoproteins (VLDL: d less than 1.019) of New Zealand male rabbits reciving @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@ (2 g/day) and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (135 mg/kg/day) is investigated.
